title: Riot Support isnt helping neither is the tickets
body: Okay so i recently upgraded my rig and now I'm getting bug  splated every time it tries to load into a game, i did everything it told me to in the article still not working. So i submitted a ticket with all the logs it told me to add, waited for about 4 days then it finally said it was "Solved" so i went on and im still getting bug splated. Sent in another ticket, comes back as "Solved" still doesn't work. So Riot Support like wtf? you made me wait for 4 days to see you have done nothing to help me. For those wondering i installed a new CPU and got a new HD monitor. if any of you have suggestions it would be much appreciated

replies.body: It looks like you had a few tickets open that were answered by Blitzbot, which is automated.  Another ticket yesterday was answered by the Funderfaker, who will be happy to continue helping you out!  Otherwise, it looks like you've figured it all out with the xbox game bar!  If you have any other concerns, hit up that ticket!

My apologies to Riot Support since this is not their fault. when i was submitting the tickets i did not know about the whole xbox dvr problem until i looked at the help and support board. my apologies for blaming you.
